questions.question: A change in momentum may result from
Two cars of equal weights and velocities collide with each other and comes to rest. Identify the type of collision

answers.a: Elastic collision, because internal kinetic energy is conserved
answers.b: Inelastic collision, because internal kinetic energy is not conserved
answers.c: Elastic collision, because internal kinetic energy is not conserved
answers.d: Inelastic collision, because internal kinetic energy is conserved

questions.question: A sphere of mass m and initial velocity vA strikes a stationary sphere of mass 2m. If sphere A has zero velocity after impact. What is the coefficient of restitution due to the impact
